title: This is so gawd damn perfect...

replies.body: Agreed, sums it up in a nutshell. All the servers, poor dudes. At least Avicus didn't get beaten up!

replies.body: At the beginning I was like, "KICK HYPIXEL'S ASS!" Then I slowly began to not like it. They beat up OCN. What did they do? MC Gamer isn't P2W either. Mineplex isn't that bad either.
replies.body_tagged: At the beginning I was like, "KICK HYPIXEL'S ASS!" Then I slowly began to not like it. They beat up OCN. What did they do? MC Gamer isn't P2W either. Mineplex isn't that bad either.

replies.body: It's the sad truth. Every server is gonna get  beat up, even non-P2W servers that have the tiniest, TINIEST, donor advantage. They're gonna get beat up, just not like that.
replies.body_tagged: It's the sad truth. Every server is gonna get  beat up, even non-P2W servers that have the tiniest, TINIEST, donor advantage. They're gonna get beat up, just not like that.
